reviewtext: This device is all you need to turn your handspring (or palm if you buy that version) into a "portable computing" solution.  The keyboard is pretty close to full size - much nicer for typing on than the  non-folding style keyboard (I forget who makes that one).One thing you  can't see from the picture is that it's not rigid at all - so it needs to  be placed on a flat surface for typing.  I'll post here again if I have  problems w/ it not lasting very long (due to it's flexibility) but I don't  expect it'll be a problem.How nice to have this sitting in my  briefcase - I'm much more spontaneous now w/ creating memos and emails  "on the go."
